title: BRIEF-Evans Dixon Says Alan Dixon Is Permanently Stepping Down From His Executive Duties
text:
BRIEF-Evans Dixon Says Alan Dixon Is Permanently Stepping Down From His Executive Duties

Stock Markets 47 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 18:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Evans Dixon Says Alan Dixon Is Permanently Stepping Down From His Executive Duties Oct 3 (Reuters) - Evans Dixon Ltd : * ALAN DIXON HAS ADVISED BOARD THAT HE IS PERMANENTLY STEPPING DOWN FROM HIS EXECUTIVE DUTIES * DIXON WILL CONTINUE AS A NON- EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR

BRIEF-Evans Dixon Says Alan Dixon Is Permanently Stepping Down From His Executive Duties
